CustomField.formula: (SUBSTITUTE(MailingStreet, " ", "") <> SUBSTITUTE(Springboard_Address_Line_1__c, " ", "") && Springboard_Address_Line_1__c <> '') || ( MailingCity <> Springboard_City__c && Springboard_City__c <> '') || (TEXT( Mailing_StateProvince_Code__c ) <> Springboard_State__c && Springboard_State__c <> '') || (MailingPostalCode <> Springboard_Zip_Code__c && Springboard_Zip_Code__c <> '') || ( TEXT( Mailing_Country_Code__c ) <> Springboard_Country__c && Springboard_Country__c <>'')
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used in Apsona to identify addresses to review where the new Springboard address doesn't match the existing address. Compares street without spaces.
CustomField.label: Springboard Address is Different?
